answers.answer: my goodness! why will he be in the nicu? you never know, you might have a healthy bouncy baby boy! good luck!I think mines coming early too!!
He has pleural effusion (liquid in area around lung)  but it's all good....delivering at a great hospital!Wahoo....hopefully both of ours gets here soon!!!

i developed preeclampsia and theyre starting to talk about induction (we'll know for sure on monday) So all three of us might be seeing our babies within 2 weeks!! and Courtcoop...i know how you feel...April snuck up on me too and with all the bedrest i havent been able to get everything completely ready yet either!!! yikes! good luck ladies!!
It seems likes all the April babies are on the way or already here! Keep us posted and I hope little Noah doesn't spend to much time in the NICU!
I hope Noah gets to come home soon after he arrives!  Braeden will be here in 9 days!  Unless he decides to show up sooner!

Im due in three days! And i have barely had any pains or anything, just extremely swollen feet and ankles :/ my midwife wont induce me until im two weeks late so ya'll will probably have your babies before me! I've been trying everything to help him out..walking, sex, evening primrose oil, bouncing on an exercise ball, spicy food (Which i just wanted any ways), going up and down stairs..and nothing. I guess he just really loves it in there! Good luck everyone!
Courtney, are you going to deliver in BI or Northshore ?  I am scheduled to deliver on Apr 26 @ BI.  Contractions have become stronger and more the frequent so hoping it will be before 26

My little ones will be here (hopefully) Weds!  We should start an April babies thread!!!  good luck to all my friends on MH.  Some of us have traveled a long and winding road (some with and some without curves and potholes!)Prayers for all!
duh, there already is an April babies thread!
So glad we are all moving along...it's been a long haul!Mamom~~ sent you an note...looks like we will be neighbors in L&D at BI!

question: Hope all of you mommies are doing well!Here's an update from me:I am 37 weeks now and if Noah does not make an appearance within 2 weeks I will be induced at 39...wow...2 weeks! Personally, I feel he is coming sooner.Got here so fast and I am so not prepared for him still!He will be in the NICU for a bit...a little hard to swallow  knowing he will be on ventilator and chest tube, but he is in good hands.
title: Noah Gabriel to arrive within 2 weeks!
